title: Eternal Bloom Chandbali Earrings - Dazzling Diamond Drops
materials: AAA Grade Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Diamonds. Features a high-shine
anti-tarnish Rhodium finish for lasting brilliance.
features: Inspired by the classic Chandbali silhouette, these earrings feature a cascading floral design with multiple layers of intricately set CZ diamonds. The flexible structure allows for graceful movement, creating a mesmerizing shimmer. The floral motif embodies prosperity and new beginnings. Features articulated drops for enhanced sparkle and movement.
occasions: or any event where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for a contemporary bride seeking a modern take on traditional Indian elegance.
description: Exceptional brilliance at an accessible price point. The Platinum plating ensures long-lasting shine and durability. The modern Chandbali design offers a fresh and stylish update to a classic South Indian jewelry form. Lightweight and comfortable to wear for extended periods.
